name: SUNSHINE COAST FLIGHT TRAINING PTY LTD
about: Sunshine Coast Flight Training Pty Ltd is a premier flying school located at the Sunshine Coast, Queensland, Australia. We offer a unique blend of recreational and general aviation training, specializing in advanced pilot skills such as aerobatics, spin prevention and recovery, and upset prevention and recovery. Our fleet includes top-class training aircraft like the TL 2000 Sting S4, Sting RG Turbo, and the Robin R2160. As the Sunshine Coast Training Campus for the Australian Aerobatic Club, we have produced numerous State and National Aerobatics Champion pilots. Our courses range from basic Recreational Pilot Certificate to Commercial Pilot Licence conversions and advanced endorsements. Led by experienced instructors, we provide safe, affordable, and fun training programs tailored to your schedule. Start your aviation journey with us and learn to fly in 3 dimensions.
